import dateNormalization from "../utils/functions" import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { AiFillStar, AiFillProfile, AiFillHeart , AiOutlineProfile, AiOutlineHeart} from "react-icons/ai"; import { useState } from "react"; const ModalCard = ({ data, setActive }) => { const [button,setButton] = useState(true) const [button2,setButton2] = useState(true) return (

{data.name ? `${data.name} (${data.original_name})` : `${data.title} (${data.original_title})`}

{data.tagline}

{ button ? button ? setButton(!button) : setButton(button)}/> : button ? setButton(!button) : setButton(button)}/> } { button2 ? button2 ? setButton2(!button2) : setButton2(button2)}/> : }

Estreno: {data.first_air_date ? dateNormalization(data.first_air_date) : dateNormalization(data.release_date)}

Votos de la gente: {data.vote_average}%

{data.overview}

setActive("")}>Leer mas...
) } export default ModalCard
